lines.text: Well, Nott and I could tell you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look like they're made out of nice metal. They're not made out platinum or anything, but they're fine candle lamps. Could be a silver-like material.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're antique, you know, for decoration?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck yeah, man. Melt that down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They'll probably want those instead of the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say we keep this teleportation a secret, unless he tries to start bargaining for shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another natural one. You have a hard time telling what kind of metal this is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to tell him about the sword?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not unless he asks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty sure it's aluminum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only if he notices the sword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I think we give him the things of monetary value. We are thinking long-term for this group, working together. This book and that blade are going to ensure a greater success and cohesion in the future.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what we're saying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then we are as one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can try to fit it in the bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it rips? I don't think it's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If it pierces, it's bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we try to do it but go with the hilt downward? See what happens?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we try to camouflage it? We could wrap it in reeds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rub some of the ash on it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if I have you on my shoulders? Like a kid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah, of course. That's normally how I like to travel.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We put-- behind us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like it can be up your butt!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How would that work? In front of me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's connected to-- That's not going to work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I like this. I could drape myself over it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What all is in that haversack that you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have some crossbow bolts, and this crowbar, and the sledgehammer--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we take out everything except for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have this longsword. I have these old vases that we're going to give him. I have this old dodecahedron, and I open up the lead box. This is really taking up a lot of space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb starts looking at the do--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start shoving it all back in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot we got that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How did you forget we got that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, where's our dynamite? Didn't we have dynamite? I mean, boom sticks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have boom sticks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, don't we have two boom sticks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two you never used from the fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who has them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have one, I think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't we have drugs?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have mushrooms!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) Jester!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm listening! What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know you are, but I am cutting through the noise. Can we not take everything out of that bag except for this new blade and the dodecahedron? Everything else comes out, because the rest is pretty utility, is it not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well it's eight cubic square feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might work, we can try to fit it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we can tie a rag around the end of the blade to keep it from piercing anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, does it have a scabbard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it does not. It was ornamentally placed on the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably get one of those made.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know about this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull off the new cloak that I got a handful of days ago. We can wrap this around the blade so it will not pierce.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tie it up and bundle it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course that will work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It works. It doesn't get pierced from the inside. It can only be pierced from the outside, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's magical!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you trying to place the blade inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You place it into there. It gets to the hilt, and it won't go all the way in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's too big!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have too much stuff in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I take the sledgehammer out? I'll take the sledgehammer out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The sledgehammer we leave. It's a

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will it fit once I take the sledgehammer out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything but the dodecahedron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The unfortunate thing is, it's a very long blade in comparison to other points. The space itself is somewhat amorphous, but you consider it still a central space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if roll the sword up like a Fruit Roll-up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think the sword is going to fucking fit. Here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still like Yasha's idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's try Yasha's idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just slip it up your back robe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can slip it up my back and then you can be on my shoulders like you're tired or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wear my cloak if you want to cover it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nott can put her legs out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should probably get back. We've been here awhile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He probably thinks we're dead, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we almost were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We head out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hang out at the back of the group for a split second, and hold out that wire that I used to cast that cantrip and look at the room and I look at the wire. Then I follow everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys make your way back up through the chamber where you had the encounter with the gelatinous cube and solved the riddle of the hidden interior of this research facility. You make your way through the no longer trapped chambers, still tenuously held on the various pressure plates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, we should have tried to go through that teleportation circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was broken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we should have tried harder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They worship some weird shit. Who knows what dark corners of the world it goes to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wonder if you'll come out in one of the Nine Hells but only a third of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What we would have done is face-planted on the stone floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to start with just trying to give him the rings and the art, right? Rings, art, shit-- Keep everything else.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: And the candlesticks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think the god of gods wants to say something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, your two boats are still affixed, pulled up onto the edge of the river.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I say that as soon as I left this chamber I tagged along behind my new monk best friend and sent the globules in the air around us even though she has the goggles, and I'm, while walking, trying to read every page of that journal. And will continue to do so on the boats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for saving me, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for saving me, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So who's taking which boat?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to get in a boat with Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha and Caleb on one side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest in the other?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to go in the other boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the motor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys going up back where you came?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the river keep going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The river continues going, yeah. It forked ahead where you were.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Current goes away from the direction we came from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but it's not a strong current. It's a lazy-going current, but you could row up. It's a little harder to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could see what's down the river a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we want to go back, our two muscle sisters could get us up this current for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could. It would be tiring.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're already out this far. Might as well see where it goes for a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be scary. There could be more rock monsters and things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are literally going to be rock monsters if we go back the other way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, if we are doing that, then I suggest camping in this chamber before going forward, because we are all bloodied and battered, you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. We could do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It has been a really long day so far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check, Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would know what time of day it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would because of your feat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And so would I because I rolled an 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you know that in the time you spent traveling down here in the subterranean area, resting and going through these battles-- and you left midday. It's when you had arrived to begin your journey here. It's getting pretty close to dusk. Not quite yet. The sun hasn't set.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go a little ways, and then come back if we don't find anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think we should go. We either go back the way we came, or we camp before going forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could do a scout boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we go check out what's farther along.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe one boat stays behind, the other scouts it out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to stay behind. I am out.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Separate the party!

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll check it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Terrible idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's our boat? Our boat scouts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use my staff to help navigate, Jester--

lines.name: TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: This is a terrible idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, Nott, and Caleb are staying behind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll watch over these guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You keep watch. The four of you guys--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll watch over these guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you get into one of the boats, push off, catch up onto the current, and begin to lazily drift further down the cavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like this is stupid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See you never.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be back. We're just taking a little look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're only going an hour down, tops.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I light a torch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The light picks up and spells out the interior of this chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep an eye on the roof, remember?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If the current starts to pick up, we're going to fight it and try to go back, yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As they float away out of earshot, I say to my two friends here: you know, if need be, The Mighty

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we taking a cat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Oh, I don't think it works that far away from him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, Frumpkin is scarfing around my neck right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys travel for about ten or 15 minutes down before another cavern merges with the one you're in. It looks like another side of the river seems to merge with yours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's where the fork was. It comes back together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're back to the fork.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're back where the fork seems to re-merge with the path you've been taking. As you turn back onto where that happens, what do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going down that other path, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, keep going straight ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys continuing to go downriver or are you going--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're turning back and going the other way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could check out the other cavern and save the deeper part of the river for when we're together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair. Let's just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're fighting up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester turns it around and begins going against the current and pulling you guys up--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I get behind Jester and start massaging her traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Switchback towards the other avenue of the fork, and you guys continue up there. It takes a little while longer, and it's a little tiring. For the heck of it, make a constitution check, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No sweat. You're making it up the river without an issue. Your muscles are holding. It's fine. You are a beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have some sweat right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, the sound of rushing water gets louder and louder. You glance up in the direction where you're coming from, and there's a fine mist in the air, a spray.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, there's a waterfall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to climb to get to the top, and you have no idea how to get a boat up there. You get the sense that if you had gone the other way down here, you would've suddenly had a waterfall drop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there land off to the sides of the bottom of the waterfall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very thin, a half a foot to a foot, but there are a lot of stones and rocks that have tumbled through the river over time and set at the bottom that would've destroyed a boat that had fallen off the edge of that waterfall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it seem like there are any boats that are broken at the bottom of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check as you're rowing up to the edge, glancing over the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anywhere to stop the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be more of a perception check because you can't really investigate. You're not poring through it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll join this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no place to pull the boat off to the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a place to tie it off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are only really the stones here, and they're pretty slick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I only rolled a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any remnants of broken ship or boat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perception. That would have been ten, again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see the water crashing down a little, so there are a couple of small platforms on the way that it's hitting and splashing off again. The spray is causing all this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the waterfall really hardcore? Could we see if there's anything behind the waterfall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, at the moment, no. From what you can see in the vicinity, you see the water rushing down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a little bit closer? I can poke.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Find Clarota again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to get closer so that she can poke through the waterfall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take my staff and jab it behind there, see if there's anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little space behind the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's always shit behind waterfalls. I think we should.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it's going to bludgeon us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm already taking off my jacket. I'm taking off everything that I don't want to get wet, keeping just one sword, and I'm going to go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nipple rings in or out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those things are dangerous. They catch on shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly jumps off the boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're going? You're jumping now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to try to get the boat through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not letting him go by himself. I do the same thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to get the boat through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You row the boat. You pull through the waterfall and the boat (cracks). The opening is not wide enough for the boat, and it jams up into the space and gets lodged, and the waterfall is on you guys and in the boat. It's filling up the boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I save the boat! Okay, I try to push off and not sink the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I help her push off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you have advantage because she's aiding you with this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez. Oh, much better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. Yeah, that'll do it. You push away from the waterfall. Actually, I'm going to pull up some audio for this because I have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really want to go see what's behind the waterfall, but I don't want to lose the boat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm crawling up into it, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll lose the boat if I jump out of the boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will it go anywhere, though? This is the end of it. It's stuck in the chamber?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, because it's going to have a flow, because the water is coming down. We have to tie it off on something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything to tie the boat on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is nothing here, unfortunately. It's slick rocks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you see anything on the other side?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll let you know when I get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's swimming, making his way through at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Where is it? I'm so excited. I want to hear your white noise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In cold water?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll be good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think it works like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It does because I've been doing it at home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way through--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Much better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Keep it thematic. You come up from underneath and you can see, as soon as you come up and reach out your feet and your hands, both of you guys begin to catch soft river floor, and eventually it comes up to a plateau, and this is a small, enclosed chamber in the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) I've always wanted to do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Darkvision. Do I see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It only goes back about ten or so feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Clarota voice) Welcome to my home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Clarota voice) It's been a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Clarota voice) Time is a circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has manacles or chains attached to its wrists, neck, and feet, and they're all connected by a singular chain in the center, and it's resting there, and it's probably been here for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's bad luck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We seem to keep finding these. I am going to examine this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, the body's pretty rotted. It looks like whatever clothing they're wearing is very basic material that is-- It would be more disintegrated if there wasn't so much moisture in the area, and it looks like bits of it have been eaten away with fungus and mold over time. The manacles are very well made, and looking at the edges where they connect, there's a small rune at that point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No scratches in the walls or any pouches or compartments on the floor around this little space?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around the interior of the chamber, unfortunately, there are no secret compartments or any alcoves. It looks like whoever was in here may have been an individual who escaped from a boat that was unprepared for the fall, and whoever was rowing them down this chamber either didn't survive or didn't know about this hidden alcove, and this individual was in here until they passed away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do those manacles look like?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we could use those. I'll walk over and I step on the elbow joint and snap it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do, the whole skeleton implodes entirely, and the manacles slip off as the different joints pull apart and alleviate the manacles. Now you're holding the center chain, so you have the neck ring, the wrist and the ankle rings all dangling from this cluster of chain you're holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will pick up the skull and take a look at it. It is human?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be human. Make a medicine check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All these checks. Where's my medicine? There. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the features of the skull, they're a little bit more delicate than an average human's skull. You get the sense they may be of partial elven blood. Not full elf, but partial elf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never go full elf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very true. Well, on your way, Yorick. I set it adrift.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, put the manacles over and I'll jump back in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to also keep my eyes open. I'm going to try to get a little bit down into this to see if there's any bits and pieces underwater.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I was going to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check when you came back in the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do a little pat down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I aid him or help him do something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You guys both go down there. You roll twice, with advantage, then. The help action allows you to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything of worth someone must have come back for and sifted through because everything down there is rotted wood and things that weren't useful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to kick my way back up to the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys break the surface and climb back into the boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh. Gross, Molly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you find anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot of bad decisions. Several boats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Fjord (impact) over the side and you see the chains on the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone who didn't quite get away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, give me a hand?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Breathy) Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Singing) Oskar!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I should find that gross, but I'm kind of into it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, people are going to start--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spin him around once?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Jester voice) You are like my little doll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did find one interesting thing: a place to stash things if we don't want them to be found.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh that's-- ooh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How easy is it to get back down here, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Real difficult.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well. If we come out the other way, then we know how to get back down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (as pigeon) Coo! We're never coming back here, coo! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a good place to hide though, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, even wet you're, like, 150? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am 185 easy, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He is very wet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord. 150? No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere in the world right now, someone's laughing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think if you beg for it, it makes it even better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's even better, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Explain that joke. Explain it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What're you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're good to go back and join the others, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back, fighting the current. Go ahead and make another constitution check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. I'm getting real tired, you guys-- Oh, I'm not. I'm not getting tired at all, actually. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a mildly damp Mollymauk. Actually the whole crew is damp at this point from being under the waterfall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long were they gone for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time with the searching it would probably be close to an hour or so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could probably read an average novel in over an hour, so has this journal been read?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For what you can, yeah. You've read everything in the journal you can make sense of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While they were gone--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well do you have another spell slot for Tongues? Well, for Comprehend Languages. Not Tongues.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh because it's in a different language. Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The research journal? The research one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, because I used my magic thingy to get a slot back earlier in the day, so no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (as Jester) Technically can't you remember everything? You just don't understand it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I remember what I skimmed, but I don't--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it written in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Draconic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have a photographic memory, don't you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of what I skimmed. I have to actually read it to remember it, and I did not read this entire book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can't cast a spell and then remember the language. He has to actually--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't touch the book to my head and then I have it. I have to eat the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Just piece by piece. All right. Now that you've re-joined with your compatriots--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we want to long rest or go back?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Long rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's camp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys take the boats back onto the side. Where are you resting, here on the side of the river?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! What I would have done if they left and I'm tapped, Caleb would have used a ritual to cast Comprehend Languages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a ritual spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, you're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am up to speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you're good. All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should actually go back inside and use the entrance as a good funnel. Don't leave ourselves in the open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, if you're done with that book do you think I could hold on to it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to read it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'd love to. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys pull the boats up on the side, head back inside. Where are you going to set up camp on the inside of the chamber?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about in the place where we disarmed all the traps? We know that that's safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a bit deep in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well we can't camp in the staircase.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just inside of the rock collapse?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a staircase.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is? Immediately?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, immediately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are a reader?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then yeah, at the bottom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the top-- or the bottom. The bottom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think at the top, personally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because the bottom one with the things, the traps blockers--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right before the staircase, right inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that. You guys set up a small camp area, take whatever bedrolls and materials that you have to do the best you can to set up a space to sleep. You find enough of a division in the floor to at least get to a resting point and you guys begin your evening's long rest. Could I have everybody at the table except for Fjord please leave and go take your break a little early?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) More bad dreams!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Because he was in the water before!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Every time he touches the water he has backstory!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck that kraken!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's a whole different show.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the same show!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crack into a Kraken.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your time! It's all good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I want to bring this with me that's all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no. Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sleep takes you and the darkness of your dream state alleviates you of the stress of the day. Your aching muscles turning numb, your physical form and consciousness now removed and aimless in this dark space. You look down at your hands, and there you see clasped in your grip the hooked and curved blade that you had recently bound with. In your grasp, you swing it and slowly inspect as you do. As you swirl the blade around in your hand, it almost has a trail around it. As you hold it coldly in you grasp, this yellow light suddenly emerges in front of you, as a familiar, large, yellow eye now looks upon you. A voice fills you, directionless, "Consume." You glance at the blade and back at the eye and the voice again says, "Consume." What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Consume. Oh god, am I going to try to swallow the sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a large blade, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about this wide in places. It comes out and it arcs and curves and has jagged edges on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what you mean, consume? Fuck it, I'll turn the blade over and keeping my eyes on the big eye, I'll bring it up to my mouth and open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's cold to the touch of your tongue, the blade completely absent of any temperature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panting) Everyone else is asleep in the area. No one seems to have woken up from your presence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything in my hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing in your hands, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wipe my mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wipe your mouth. There's a little bit of blood right there across your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and summon the sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do and as you summon it, there before you is not the Wastehunter Blade, but the falchion now returned to grasp with a strange, more hooked and jagged appearance to it. It seems the essence of this pact has consumed the weapon you had bound with and made it one with the falchion you made this pact with oh so long ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I try and keep my-- (clears throat) Fu-- Make it disappear again. Has anybody woken up? Are any eyes open at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll lay back down and go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where we'll take our break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll come back at the end of the break to give this to the winner, so we'll see you guys here in a few minutes. Thanks so much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you crazy motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back everybody! First off we have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, good call back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our winner for this evening, for the wonderful wenge hero vault is Darkone_Nightshade.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations, Danoba will get your contact info and get that sent out to you, congrats. All righty, so as you guys all come to consciousness, in the cold, desolate dark space within this long abandoned research facility from the Age of Arcanum, you stiffly get off the ground, collect your stuff. What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do a few push ups to get warmed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. Beau's doing her morning routine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, some squats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we did a long rest-y?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we did a long-y rest-y.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to sit and attune to the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You attuned to the blade, perfect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, you were not, I don't want to jinx it or anything, but I don't think that you were hit in any of the fights yesterday, were you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is not correct. I was not hit in the final fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you remained pretty much unscathed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I made out better than usual, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that was the only day that you let me put flowers in your hair, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I see where you are going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm saying, maybe, sometimes old wives' tales are true!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well I am not much of a believer in old wives' tales, but I do like trial and error, so if you would like to do it again today--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As an experiment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As an experiment, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a focus group test thing. I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true. You need more than one example.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True. Sample size.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have any more flowers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got to find that average.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Standard deviation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take some time to put a little braid in his hair, and stick a little flower stem or two in there, and try to make a little flower mohawk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do I look?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a satyr. Like in those ancient Greek paintings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Current Greek.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: What is Greek?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (robot voice) What is Greek? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you all wet again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and inspect. No, there is no--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No dampness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No sea-foam froth, though there is a bit of dried blood at the corner of Fjord's mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dried blood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, you have a little something right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you shave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you bite your lip?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I fucking grind my teeth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should wear a bite guard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that why--? Is it a sleep thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, nope. Just bit myself in my sleep, that's all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, is that why what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that why, well you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Well I don't want to say anything. I'm afraid it will offend him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can say it to me then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Well, most of the half-orcs I've seen have bigger tusks. (loudly) It's okay, Fjord, if you don't have a big tusk! It's not a big deal!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, big tusks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's totally fine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Jester. I appreciate--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that an indication of other body parts? Do you have anything there? Do you have nubs? What are those?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't you pull down your lower lip and show us what's going on in there, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup, I pull down my lower lip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have a cool lip tattoo?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You see very short, nubby teeth, with scratches and divots and chips on the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On all of the teeth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just on the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sympathetic) Just on the tusks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had said that you did your own dental work at one point. Did you do that? On purpose?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Couldn't afford a root canal?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would have been a better excuse. When I was younger, they used to make fun of my teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kids can be cruel so I decided to take away the target that was most easily available for them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you grow up with people who did not have tusks like you? So you were different?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, at the time there weren't any others like me. I feel like I was especially picked on for my teeth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My childhood damage--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a ten, not great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, generally you can say "do I believe him?" and I'll tell you to make an insight check. It's not "I'm going to use an Insight Check action!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But insight check is so much dickisher.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really is. Do you still feel the same way about your teeth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not necessarily. It became a habit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to continue to do it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure I don't have to. It's like people who chew their nails, I guess.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They will always grow back, even if you--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They are persistent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How quickly do they come back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not super fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that why you have blood on your mouth? Were you filing your teeth last night?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I think I bit my lip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate it when that happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right, and then you bite it again the next day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I believe him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an insight check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that nine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's nine? It's 1,000?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No way!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rolling so well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you do any other bod mod to yourself growing up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bod mod? No, I did not.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you kill any of the children that made fun of you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Children are assholes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I didn't have that sort of a streak in me then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, did you kill any of your fellow children growing up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you have to go to battle, if you have a challenge, you kill somebody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you kill them, then they're not really your friends, are they?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was a bit tougher than most of the other kids. I felt like I could take the physical poking, but the jeering, I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The emotional poking was too much!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is many years later, though. I can't imagine that any of us would even blink at tusks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, it's not even really that intentional. I'll find myself picking at them every once in a while.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you ever want them to stay there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like to grow back?

lines.name: LIAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there are times. I've seen them: other half orcs with the teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guy in Tusk Love had them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He did, yeah. I feel like it's a trait that exemplifies the rougher side of my race, so sometimes I wish I had them, and sometimes I'm glad I don't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well you know for many of us, our early days are always with us. I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is how you see yourself, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's how I'd like to see myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it's how we see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you would look fine either way, Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean we're too distracted with our own personal damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You saying I should let them grow out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm saying if you want to, you would look good that way as well. You look good this way, you would look good that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Co-signed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fair. How about, you see me picking at them, or chipping at them or any of that shit, you just say the word and I'll stop.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wind blows through the distant tunnels above, and for a minute you all shiver as the cold wind finds its way down below. Except for you, you're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm good. Warm blooded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go back to The Gentleman?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's probably time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So cloak on your back. Sword on the cloak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott on the sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we don't have to do that now! We have a whole boat trip to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Sword up the butt!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Yep, straight up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Just like a puppet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is this a bad-- should I stay outside or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is no. We are going on. We are going right through their territory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he notices it, then he notices it, if he doesn't, then he doesn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we bribe him with the information on the teleportation circle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or he can challenge me, and I can, you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are a very convincing group, I think we can talk our way through that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really good at lying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have your ways. Well, the morning is getting on, shall we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get in the boats.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hans and Franz, will you please muscle us up this stream?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys taking the same boat arrangements?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hans and Franz?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to make your way up the river now, going against the current, muscling your way up and up further and further still. You come across the area where you had the initial confrontation with the darkmantles and begin to push and push.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Harder because there're things there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check, both of you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Eyes on the ceiling as well because that's where danger came from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Eyes on the side where the rock guys were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got 20. Not a natural.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She rolled well. This a strength check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, while doing fine yesterday, trying to do the advanced pushes, you're still making it up the stream, but you're still a little sore from the night before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She did rowing yesterday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. However, you're not making any loud noises at the moment. As you glance up, none of the darkmantles-- you look up and you can see now there are a few that are adhered to the ceiling, but they don't seem to have noticed your presence yet. As you're rowing through, you're falling behind. You manage to get through unnoticed and actually way above the one boat. I need all the rest of you to make stealth checks. She's not on your boat, which would be Jester, Beau, Molly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Blessing of the Trickster, sure. On you.

lines.name: LIAM
